headline: AON Q4 Earnings Surpass Estimates on New Business Growth
summary: Aon's Q4 results reflect strong organic growth and NFP acquisition synergies. However, rising costs weigh on margins.

headline: Marsh McLennan Q4 2024 attributable net income rises 4% to $788m
summary: For the full year 2024, the company reported a net income of $4.06bn, an 8.27% increase from $3.75bn in 2023.

raw.headline: Marsh McLennan Q4 2024 attributable net income rises 4% to $788m
raw.summary: For the full year 2024, the company reported a net income of $4.06bn, an 8.27% increase from $3.75bn in 2023.

headline: Marsh McLennan reports Q4 EPS $1.87, consensus $1.76
summary: Reports Q4 revenue $6.1B , consensus $.5.96B…Consulting revenue was $2.4 B in the fourth quarter of 2024, an increase of 6% on both a GAAP and underlying basis. Operating income was $466 M Adjusted operating income increased 1% to $484M. For the year 2024, revenue was $9.1B , an increase of 5% compared with 2023, or 6% on an underlying basis.
